paragraphs.title: iPhone App - Device Location
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select t.latitude,t.longitude, CONCAT(datetime, ' - ', name) as customer
from dfs.root.`/mapr-retail-demo/devices-db` t
where t.email = 'mkieboom@mapr.com'

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Raspberry Pi - Currently Connected devices to WiFi Access Point in Store
paragraphs.text:
%drill
select t.datetime,
       t.mac as client_mac,
       t.sensor as sensor_name, 
       t.signal as signal_strength
from dfs.root.`/mapr-retail-demo/sensors-connecteddevices-db` t
where t.datetime in (
  select t.datetime
  from dfs.root.`/mapr-retail-demo/sensors-connecteddevices-db` t
  group by t.datetime
  order by t.datetime desc
  limit 1
)
order by  t.signal ASC
